verses.text: 要傳講純正的道理至於你，你應當講合乎純正的道理。

words.note: Common in religious contexts.
Often refers to doctrine or character.
Here, refers to religious teaching or truth.

verses.text: 勸年老的男人要有節制、莊重、自律，在信心、愛心、忍耐上都要健全。

words.note: A virtue often emphasized in biblical texts.
Implies a respectful and weighty demeanor.
Refers to religious faith here.
Refers to selfless, divine love.
Referring to spiritual and moral health.

verses.text: 照樣，勸年老的婦女要生活敬虔，不說讒言，不被酒奴役，用善道教導人，

words.note: Describes devout religious behavior and attitude.
More formal/literary for 'slanderous words'.
Implies being controlled by or addicted to something.
Refers to morally upright or sound doctrine.

verses.text: 好提醒年輕的婦女愛丈夫愛兒女，
並且自律、貞潔、理家、善良、順從自己的丈夫，免得　神的道受毀謗。

words.note: More formal and traditional; often used in religious contexts.
Refers specifically to managing domestic affairs.
Often used in contexts of authority and respect.
Used to introduce a negative purpose clause.
The space/offset is a reverence marker in Chinese Bibles.
Refers to God's message or divine truth.
To speak maliciously about someone or something sacred.

verses.text: 照樣，勸年輕的男子要自律。
無論在甚麼事上你都要顯出好行為的榜樣，在教導上要純全，要莊重，
言詞要純正，無可指摘，使反對的人因為無從毀謗，就自覺慚愧。

words.note: Lit. 'no way to point out flaws'

verses.text: 作奴僕的，要凡事順服自己的主人，討他歡喜，不要頂嘴。
不要私取財物，卻要顯示絕對的誠實，好使我們救主　神的道理，在凡事上都得著尊榮。

words.note: Implies taking secretly or illicitly.

verses.text: 神拯救萬人的恩典已經顯明出來了。

words.note: Refers to God's unmerited favor.
Acts as a directional complement indicating emergence.

verses.text: 這恩典訓練我們除去不敬虔的心，和屬世的私慾，在今生過著自律、公正、敬虔的生活，

words.note: Used with 不 (bù) to form 'ungodly'.

verses.text: 等候那有福的盼望，就是我們偉大的　神，救主耶穌基督榮耀的顯現。
他為我們捨己，為的是要救贖我們脫離一切不法的事，並且潔淨我們作他自己的子民，熱心善工。

words.note: A compound verb meaning 'to deny oneself'.

words.definition: in order to, for the purpose of
words.note: Often followed by 是 to mean 'the purpose is...'

verses.text: 你要傳講這些事，運用各樣的權柄去勸戒人，責備人；不要讓人輕看你。

words.note: Indicates purpose or direction of action.
